bullets: Mechanical fittings have 1 potential leak path; hydraulic systems have 5 (4 locking pins and the plug).
Mechanical and hydraulic access fittings can both be rated to 10’000psi and above, but the mechanical tools are only rated to 6000psi.
Servicing hydraulic fittings is generally accepted as being a longer process than the mechanical system (6 against 2 leak paths, 5 against 3 mechanical threads).
title: Hydraulic vs. Mechanical Access Systems
